thread.section_title: Mazuma Mobile Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mazuma Mobile Australia | mazumamobile.com.au
thread.title: Natalie
thread.title_full: Mazuma Mobile Australia reviewed by Natalie

author: Natalie
title: Natalie
text: Had a couple of old mobiles that we didn't need anymore. Mazuma sent a bag to send the mobiles back. Rang the service desk at one point to confirm some details and the customer service rep was extremely helpful, very bright and cheerful. Transaction happened quickly with no nasty suprises. I am now looking through my house to see what other old mobile I might have that I can sell!
